data.text: É toganiiti paani, é dɔɔi ɠɛʋele ɓɛtɛ,
É ná-botiɠɛ anzanuiti teʋeni toli bosuʋɛ,
«Wɔiti wo la dɛ faa mɔinmɔin kwɛɛ, à ʋaa lɛɛ ʋɛ.»
À ɠɛlɛ nuiti ta-ziɛpolui ʋa, niiti ti la dɛ faa mɔinmɔin kwɛɛ, wa zɛnvui wo.
Zɔi a zelii lo waso nui ma, naa ɠa ɗa bɛlɛlalai zɔlɔɔ,
Mina ɲɛɛɠulasu nui zɔgi wo ma, mazɔlɔɔ toɠa è wɔinzeɠe,
Ungo, ɠima nui lɛnɛ, ta ɠa ɓɔ ná-ɠimalai ʋa.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuluabai ɠa é ga ɠimalai lɔɔzeizuʋɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ nɔ̀un nà, ɠimalai, sàɓu zu,
Ni ɗa ga ɠima nu, ɗa suɠulanumai zɔlɔɔ,
Titigi ɠa ga eɠɛ anzanui é zɔngɔzu,
«Zɔi é la dɛ faa mɔinmɔin kwɛɛ, naa ɠale ma, é ʋa ʋɛ!»
Ti la suɠwɛɛ ga ta ta li laazu gɔvɛiti ma,
